metadata.title: CVE-2022-48706 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: vdpa:ifcvf: Do proper cleanup if IFCVF init fails ifcvf_mgmt_dev leaks memory ifit is not freed before returning. Call is made to correct return statementso memory does not leak. ifcvf_init_hw does not take care of this so it isneeded to do it here.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
